reporter_caption.center: STATE FIRE PREV. C. v. CITY, WILMINGTON F. D., 765 A.2d 953 (Del. 2000)

caption.center: STATE OF DELAWARE FIRE PREVENTION COMMISSION, Appellee Below, Appellant,
v. CITY OF WILMINGTON FIRE DEPARTMENT, Plaintiff Below, Appellee.

opinion.posture:
Appeal from Superior Court, New Castle County, CA 98A-09-017.
AFFIRMED.
opinion.opinion_text:
Unpublished Opinion is below.
STATE OF DELAWARE FIRE PREVENTION COMMISSION, Appellee Below, Appellant, v. CITY OF WILMINGTON FIRE DEPARTMENT, Plaintiff Below, Appellee. No. 89, 2000. In the Supreme Court of the State of Delaware. Submitted: November 16, 2000. Decided: November 17, 2000.
Court Below: Superior Court of the State of Delaware in and for New Castle County, C. A. No. 98A-09-017.
Before VEASEY, Chief Justice, WALSH and HOLLAND, Justices.
ORDER This 17th day of November 2000, upon consideration of the briefs of the parties, and their contentions in oral argument, it appears to the Court that the judgment of the Superior Court should be affirmed on the basis of and for the reasons set forth in its decisions dated November 24, 1999, and February 3, 2000.
NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS ORDERED that the judgment of the Superior Court is AFFIRMED.
BY THE COURT:
/s/ E. Norman Veasey Chief Justice
